pages.title: Note: Grief
pages.text: Something is wrong. Very, very wrong. Even touching this $(item)Netherite$() burns, the pain centered around my $(item)ring$(). It is like my $(key)heart itself is aflame with a heavy Grief$().$(br)I must find a $(thing)treatment$() for this pain, but for now I should $(key)avoid any direct contact with the material$().
